## InspectPoliciesRequest.versionRegexp property

Only include policies with a version matching the given regular expression.

**Signature:**

```typescript
versionRegexp?: string | undefined;
```

## Remarks

Regular expressions must use the [RE2 syntax](https://golang.org/s/re2syntax)<!-- -->. Note that backreferences are not supported.
